item.title: How can i make a funpk arena
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“KillinXxSMile, post:3, topic:269194”]add:
if ((absX >= xxxx1 && absX <= xxxx2 && absY >= yyyy2 && absY <= yyyy1 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) { // coords of where the fun pk area is you need SW and NE i think

        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
        playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

        refreshSkills();
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    updateRequired = true;

        sM("//the message they receive after they die");
        teleportToX = xxxx; //put where u wanna go after you die here
        teleportToY = yyyy; //put where u wanna go after you die here

    }
    
    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();

    }

uhmm credits? to who ever made the first funpk area? uhm i really dont care[/quote]
umm explain more

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make a funpk arena
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

add:
if ((absX >= xxxx1 && absX <= xxxx2 && absY >= yyyy2 && absY <= yyyy1 && IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) { // coords of where the fun pk area is you need SW and NE i think

        NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
        setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
        playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
        playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

        refreshSkills();
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    updateRequired = true;

        sM("//the message they receive after they die");
        teleportToX = xxxx; //put where u wanna go after you die here
        teleportToY = yyyy; //put where u wanna go after you die here

    }
    
    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();

    }

uhmm credits? to who ever made the first funpk area? uhm i really dont care
